contents.title: Rooms
contents.description: content type 2 with video/image & title & contents

contents.title: MY ROOM
contents.content: If minimalist, comfortable simplicity makes you happy, then MY Rooms are the place to be. These offer a selection of Queen-size or Two Single beds within spaces measuring 18 square metres, great for single travelers or couples looking for a fuss-free experience.

contents.title: OUR ROOM
contents.content: Travelling with your loved ones? OUR Rooms selection of Queen-size and Two Single beds in a 22 - 25 square-metre space, making it ideal for a happy family getaway.

contents.title: OUR BIG ROOM
contents.content: So you like things big? Well, look no further because OUR BIG Rooms are between 25 - 30 square metres each, and come with a Queen Beds. It’s perfect for keeping larger groups and families happy!

contents.title: OUR FAMILY ROOM
contents.content: So you like things big? Well, look no further because OUR FAMILY rooms are 48 square metres each, and come with 2 King-size bed. It’s perfect for keeping larger groups and families happy!
